TopicTitle: Screep - an mmo rts for programmers

Articles.Content:
Screep isn't lying when calling itself as a game for programmer. There is no simplification of coding process here like other similar games to make it more acessible to lay person .In this game you have to actually write real java script codes to command your units, from building, trading, attacking, defending and so on. The more efficient you are with your code, the better your army perform, and as the game continues on even when you log off, the commands you left to your army will be your only line of defense.

I wonder if the devs are trying to build a robot army from player codes lol.

This is a pretty cool concept. Does the game also offer ways to improve your army based on your code? I can't wait until this branches off into other languages too.
